data.text: @Nabe2SaveRH @DavidCGrabowski @politico Allow mandatory reporting of neglect and abuse without having to give a name by staff.
@DavidCGrabowski @AgingMeg @politico Too much money going to the top. These places have little compassion and ethics for the elderly they are supposed to serve.
@DavidCGrabowski @politico And allowing those who got into the profession to do what they came to do: care.

@DavidCGrabowski @JAMAHealthForum @CM_Whaley @KosaliSimon @thuynguyen_dieu Never mind that this article is all over the place, touching on wages, benefits, Medicaid, rebuilding, etc., there are countless unpaid volunteers who lovingly tend to the elderly whilst many (not all or most) nursing home staff members could care less about other human beings.
